thread.title: TABLE-Danielle Steel's 'Accidental Heroes' tops U.S. bestsellers

author: Reuters Editorial
title: TABLE-Danielle Steel's 'Accidental Heroes' tops U.S. bestsellers
text: March 29 (Reuters) - Danielle Steel's new romance "Accidental Heroes" topped the U.S. best-sellers list on Thursday. Data released by independent, online and chain bookstores, book wholesalers and independent distributors across the United States was used to compile the list. Hardcover Fiction Last week 1. "Accidental Heroes" - Danielle Steel (Delacorte) 2. "The Punishment She Deserves" - Elizabeth George (Viking) 3. "The Great Alone" 2 Kristin Hannah (St. Martin's) 4. "The Rising Sea" 1 Cussler/Brown (Putnam) 5. "The Bishop’s Pawn" - Steve Berry (Minotaur) 6. "Little Fires Everywhere" 4 Celeste Ng (Penguin Press) 7. "The Woman in the Window" 3 A.J. Finn (Morrow) 8. "A Day in the Life of Marlon Bundo" - Twiss/Keller (Chronicle) 9. "Before We Were Yours" 6 Lisa Wingate (Ballantine) 10. "Covert Game" - Christine Feehan (Berkley) Hardcover Non-Fiction 1. "Secret Empires" - Peter Schweizer (Harper) 2. "Russian Roulette" 1 Isikoff/Corn (Twelve) 3. "12 Rules for Life" 3 Jordan B. Peterson (Random House Canada) 4. "Food" 5 Mary Hyman (Little, Brown) 5. "Pretty Mess" - Erika Jayne (Gallery) 6. "I’ve Been Thinking..." 4 Maria Shriver (Viking/Dorman) 7. "There Is More" - Brian Houston (WaterBrook) 8. "The Rock, the Road, and the Rabbi" 2 Kathie Lee Gifford (W) 9. "Fire and Fury" 6 Michael Wolff (Holt) 10. "Educated" 7 Tara Westover (Random House) (Compiled by Jill Serjeant; Editing by Richard Chang)
